overview:
Chris Sanfilippo is the CEO of Modern World INC, a web development company in Tampa, FL.

The first two websites that Chris has developed under his new company are Phonequote.org and mybizmap.com.

Mybizmap.com is a map of mobile, freelance, and home-based businesses. It’s a place for businesses to advertise their services, and for consumers to find businesses near them.

Phonequote.org was built to test the functionality of the key components of mybizmap.com. Phonequote.org is a live and up to date site that provides consumers with a fair selling price of any used smartphone. It is a price guide for used phones.
